name: Zelda RPG: Link's Reawakening
description: This is a fan made passion project over 20 years in the works. It is a sequel to Link's Awakening. This is a fan telling a story of what could possibly have happened after the first game. It is not an official product on Nintendo and there is absolutely no money involved. It is simply for love of the game. It is the first ever Zelda game that is a turn based RPG.
